{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine whether discharging patients earlier from Winnipeg hospitals adversely affects quality of care, we need to consider several factors. First, we should examine the reasons for early discharge. If patients are being discharged early due to improved treatment protocols or better management of their conditions, it is less likely to adversely affect quality of care. Second, we should assess the availability of appropriate follow-up care and support services for discharged patients.
